subject: Re: [SHQ] What happened to the SHQ MessageBoard?

Unfortunately, EZ-Board got hacked into and major damage done.  *All* of the messageboards supported there were damaged, some completely unrecoverable.  Secretary may have more up to date information about what they were doing to restore boards, but I think they've done all they could with back-ups that weren't damaged.  In trying to better safeguard the system and repair it, I think they did some additional damage, too.
 
Cool idea with the reviews.  Best place to send them is to this list, SHQ.  The Spy Division is more for member and other fan fiction and art.  ^_^
 
phil

niwashi_1 <labaker@...> wrote:
I found the Shinsengumi Headquarters message board
http://p076.ezboard.com/bshinsengumiheadquarters
not too long ago - just long enough to see that it had a bunch of 
interesting stuff posted there.  Unfortunately, before I had time to 
go through and read all that interesting stuff, it started 
disappearing.  At first it was just some of the posts missing, then 
all of the posts and many of the forums disappeared.

What's going on???  And is it going to get fixed?


On a marginally related note, I recently bought the first volume of 
each of several different Shinsengumi manga.  I was thinking of 
writing up a little first-impression mini-review of each of them and 
posting it on the messageboard (if it were still there).  I guess I'll 
post to the Yahoo group instead (although I generally like message 
boards better than e-mail lists).  Is the SHQ group or the 
SHQ_Spy_Division group the better one to send reviews to?


Niwashi
